Welcome to barnsley house

  • 17:05
  • 31 °C
  • Mostly sunny

Grow your own story...

Let the clocks stop… and time stand still. Steal away to a picture-perfect Cotswold village and stay at your very own country house retreat, nestled in fairytale gardens. Nourish your spirit with reviving treatments in the hideaway garden spa. Dine on delicious dishes with produce picked from the abundant garden…the magical heart and soul of this special place. Intimate and timeless, Barnsley House feels like a best-kept secret… ripe for a spot of romance, or a celebration you’ll never forget.
Learn more

Classicaly romantic

A timeless escape of charm

Leave the kids at home and indulge in a romantic weekend for two... or an unforgettable celebration. From hideaway rooms to a private and romantic secret garden suite

Fresh, local, and simply delicious

Overlooking the glorious gardens and terrace, a table awaits you in The Potager, where you can enjoy a wonderful meal in a tranquil and unhurried atmosphere. Just across the road is The Village Pub, our very own Cotswolds country inn, with hearty pub fare that's a cut above what you might expect. We're passionate about showcasing fresh, local ingredients and in true garden-to-plate philosophy, many of our vegetables, salads and herbs are freshly picked from our kitchen garden every morning.
Learn more

Reasons to visit us

Located near Cirencester, Barnsley House is the perfect base to discover the Cotswolds… whether you’re exploring by foot, bike, car… or hot air balloon! From golf and polo, to cookery courses and theatre plays, these are just some of the activities we recommend, but if there’s something different you’d like to try.

  • Retreat

    Barnsley Spa is a tranquil sanctuary for ultimate relaxation offering a range of indulgent treatments and therapies - tucked away in a corner of our beautiful gardens, it's available for our guests to enjoy for a blissful amount of relaxation and me time during an overnight stay at Barnsley House.
    Learn More

  • Awaken

    A secret hideaway enveloped by gorgeous gardens, the spa is designed to help you recharge, revive and feel heavenly from head-to-toe. We believe in the power of nature which is why you'll find natural and botanical elements from the garden all around the spa… indoor plants, tables crafted from tree trunks and lavender placed on treatment beds. The spa lounge boasts simply enchanting views of the surrounding countryside… so relaxation begins as soon as you enter.
    Learn More

  • Weddings

    Say 'I do' in the beautiful surroundings of our gardens, feast on your favourite dishes with a custom menu created for you by our Head Chef… and party till the small hours with your loved ones. And with all the hidden nooks in the gardens and house, there’s no shortage of stunning backdrops for your photos… official and unofficial!
    Learn More
